Free Google Docs invoice template

Another update (09/03/09): public access to google invoice template has been removed, click here to read more.

Update: for some reason editing permission to the world doesn't work anymore. If you need to use this invoice template, please find a way to request access in the menu, and I shall grant you full access.

I decided to share a free Google Docs template. One day I moved my invoicing and other work-related to Google Docs and was more than certain I could find free templates somewhere. It wasn't so. The problem is not that it's hard to create this template. It's just time consuming. So for a while I decided to just write it in text editor and sum all fees up by hand. I am sure many do the same.Well I got sick of it and got it done. So here's template that you can open and export to your Google Docs or you can do that with attached .ods file.

http://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?hl=en&key=p4ujQdgArOYil1jQof2gSBw#

Critical update: I noticed a lot of interest in this invoice, did some research, it appears to be the only free Google Docs Free Invoice Template on the Internet. If you like what you use, donate $1 by clicking a button below:

 

I do have some ideas on making this invoice template more usable and more elegant, I am thus planning to implement it. If you have more suggestions, please post in the comments below. 


I realise that it isn't perfect and will gladly hear all suggestions and critisism. For me, it's better than creating invoices by hand.

Thu, May 22 2008
